        public static void mutateLevel(Pair<SSTableMetadata,java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer>> oldMetadata,
               Descriptor descriptor,
               java.lang.String filename,
               int level)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Scary method mutating existing sstable component Tries to do it safely by moving the new file on top of the old one Caller needs to reload the sstable metadata (sstableReader.reloadSSTableMetadata())
        Parameters:
        oldMetadata -
        descriptor -
        filename -
        level -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
